params.lowerTick: initial lower bound of the Uniswap V3 position
params.managerFee: proportion of earned fees that go to pool manager in Basis Points
params.tokenA: one of the tokens in the uniswap pair
params.tokenB: the other token in the uniswap pair
params.uniFee: fee tier of the uniswap pair
params.upperTick: initial upper bound of the Uniswap V3 position

returns.pool: the address of the newly created Vault (proxy)

returns._0: deployers the list of deployer addresses
list of Gelato managed Vault addresses

params.deployer: address that has potentially deployed Harvesters (can return empty array)

returns._0: pools the list of Vault addresses deployed by `deployer`
address that controls the Vault implementation (has power to upgrade it)
bool signaling if pool is immutable (true) or not (false)

manager().details: Returns the address of the current manager.

returns._0: total number of Vault deployer addresses
total number of Harvesters deployed by `deployer`

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without manager. It will not be possible to call `onlyManager` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current manager. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an manager, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the manager.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current manager.

deployVault(address,address,uint24,addre.notice: deployVault creates a new instance of a Vault on a specified UniswapV3Pool. The msg.sender is the initial manager of the pool and will forever be associated with the Vault as it's `deployer`

getDeployers().notice: getDeployers fetches all addresses that have deployed a Vault

getGelatoPools().notice: getGelatoPools gets all the Harvesters deployed by Gelato's default deployer address (since anyone can deploy and manage Harvesters)

getPools(address).notice: getPools fetches all the Vault addresses deployed by `deployer`

getProxyAdmin(address).notice: getProxyAdmin gets the current address who controls the underlying implementation of a Vault. For most all pools either this contract address or the zero address will be the proxyAdmin. If the admin is the zero address the pool's implementation is naturally no longer upgradable (no one owns the zero address).

isPoolImmutable(address).notice: isPoolImmutable checks if a certain Vault is "immutable" i.e. that the proxyAdmin is the zero address and thus the underlying implementation cannot be upgraded

numDeployers().notice: numDeployers counts the total number of Vault deployer addresses

numPools().notice: numPools counts the total number of Harvesters in existence

numPools(address).notice: numPools counts the total number of Harvesters deployed by `deployer`
